summary: A little fix for the sound uner the water. Original is too ugly for me !
descriptionHtml:
Simply a little fix for the underwater sound in Skyrim.

The original one is very ugly ( repeat himself infinitely... ) So i edit him.

The second file is a fix for a very annoying bug i have sometime. When i'm not underwater, i have the sound like if i was. In this case, i have simply delete the sound so even underwater you will not have the sound anymore. Yeah that suck but anyway better than that #!*@ bug !

NO ESP AND NO SCRIPT YOU ARE WELCOME !!

Nexus does a lot for me ! Now it's my time ;)

Don't hesitate to share.

PS : I have take the image to electricsheep26354. I don't own it.

Other fixe submited by MaianTrey : limit your fps to 60 ( with enbseries for exemple ). Thanks to him.

Reupload because the one was hidden don't know why...
author: Aaziz33
